segments.text: I see the woman in her apron, meticulously wiping the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunlight from the window highlights her concentration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Wait, the faucet is on, and the sink is brimming over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is flooding out, pooling at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea, just keeps drying away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nearby, a boy's on a stool, raiding the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks thrilled, holding a plate to balance his haul.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool is leaning, it's scary how unstable it is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl is helping by reaching up expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're like little conspirators in their sweet theft.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside seems so serene and orderly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This indoor scene is full of unnoticed trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but worry about the slip or fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a mix of everyday life and impending chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
